h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Flame Mediator Location
content: The Flame Mediator Soak can be obtained from any of the Searing-Fire enemies within the Flaming Mountains. Farm them around the Field of Fire at the Cooling Slope until it randomly drops from one of them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flame_Mediator.md', within the main section titled 'Flame Mediator', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Flame Mediator Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Flame Mediator Soak can be obtained from any of the Searing-Fire enemies within the Flaming Mountains. Farm them around the Field of Fire at the Cooling Slope until it randomly drops from one of them.
